description: Microsoft OneDrive is a cloud storage service provided by Microsoft for storing, accessing, and sharing files online.
name: microsoftOneDrive
title: Microsoft OneDrive

actions.description: Download a file from your Microsoft OneDrive.
actions.name: downloadFile

properties.description: ID of the folder from which you want to download the file.
properties.name: parentId
properties.label: Parent Folder ID

properties.description: ID of the file to download.
properties.name: id
properties.label: File ID

actions.title: Download File

actions.description: List files in a OneDrive folder.
actions.name: listFiles

properties.description: ID of the folder from which you want to list files. If no folder is specified, the root folder will be used.
properties.name: parentId
properties.label: Parent Folder ID

actions.title: List Files

actions.description: List folders in a OneDrive folder.
actions.name: listFolders

properties.description: ID of the Folder from which you want to list folders. If no folder is specified, the root folder will be used.
properties.name: parentId
properties.label: Parent Folder ID

actions.title: List Folders

actions.description: Upload a file to your Microsoft OneDrive.
actions.name: uploadFile

properties.description: ID of the Folder where the file should be uploaded; if no folder is selected, the file will be uploaded in the root folder.
properties.name: parentId
properties.label: Parent Folder ID

actions.title: Upload File
